name: Idol of Yogg-Saron
description:
After conjuring Shadowy Apparitions, gain a stack of Idol of Yogg-Saron. At 25 stacks, you summon a Thing from Beyond that serves you for 20 sec.

The Thing from Beyond blasts enemies for 7,206 Shadow damage and deals 30% of that damage to all enemies within 10 yards. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.
